title: Compliancy Group
description: Offering a comprehensive compliance management platform, this top-rated software simplifies healthcare compliance by integrating HIPAA, OSHA, and SOC 2 standards with features like compliance training, incident reporting, and vendor management.

children.value: Offering a comprehensive compliance management platform, this top-rated software simplifies healthcare compliance by integrating HIPAA, OSHA, and SOC 2 standards with features like compliance training, incident reporting, and vendor management.
